author: jrepusseau
title: NFT for food value chain resilience
description: In developing countries in Asia, Africa, LatAm smallholders urgently needs $238B investments to build sustainable intensive agriculture*
solution: We build a verified food information&certification system with NFTs hold by smallholders farmers that reward sustainable practice using ADA.
